parameters.name: Plasmapause_MLTbin
parameters.description: Sharpest gradient from equatorial IMAGE EUV Ion Images, at 48 MLT 0:0.5:23.5 MLT hours (spectrogram)

parameters.name: Mapped_Plasmapause_Grid
parameters.description: Sharpest gradient from equatorial IMAGE EUV Ion Images.

parameters.name: Mapped_Plasmapause_Grid_flip_vert
parameters.description: Sharpest gradient from equatorial IMAGE EUV Ion Images. Images flipped so 6MLT is to the left

parameters.name: Mapped_Plasmapause_Grid_Movie
parameters.description: ---> (MOVIE) Sharpest gradient from equatorial IMAGE EUV Ion Images.

parameters.name: Quality_Flag
parameters.description: Integer quality rating 1:3 of the plasmapause data with 3 being the best

parameters.name: Equatorial_EUV_Grid
parameters.description: IMAGE EUV Images mapped to the equatorial plane.

parameters.name: Equatorial_EUV_Grid_flip_vert
parameters.description: IMAGE EUV Images mapped to the equatorial plane. Images flipped so 6MLT is to the left

parameters.name: Equatorial_EUV_Grid_Movie
parameters.description: ---> (MOVIE) IMAGE EUV Images mapped to the equatorial plane.

parameters.name: Equatorial_EUV_Grid_log
parameters.description: IMAGE EUV Images mapped to the equatorial plane, log10 scale.

parameters.name: Equatorial_EUV_Grid_log_Movie
parameters.description: ---> (MOVIE) IMAGE EUV Images mapped to the equatorial plane, log10 scale.

parameters.name: xsm
parameters.description: x satellite position in sm coordinates

parameters.name: ysm
parameters.description: y satellite position in sm coordinates

parameters.name: zsm
parameters.description: z satellite position in sm coordinates

parameters.name: L
parameters.description: L_dip - L-shell calculated from R and MLAT assuming a dipole magnetic field

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: Spectral feature for auto-fit, 1:Upper Hybrid, 2:Z-Mode, 3:Continuum Edge

parameters.name: numHarmonics
parameters.description: number of n+1/2 harmonics recognized by automatic routine

parameters.name: fce
parameters.description: electron cyclotron frequency from the spacing of n+1/2 harmonics

parameters.name: stdevFCE
parameters.description: standard deviation (kHz) of fce_n+1/2 based on individual frequencies

parameters.name: BA_AstRatesX
parameters.description: AST body rates (X) in GCI frame

parameters.name: BA_AstRatesY
parameters.description: AST body rates (Y) in GCI frame

parameters.name: BA_AstRatesZ
parameters.description: AST body rates (Z) in GCI frame

parameters.name: BA_CmdHSc1
parameters.description: Commanded Momentum Vector (X) in s/c frame

parameters.name: BA_CmdHSc2
parameters.description: Commanded Momentum Vector (Y) in s/c frame

parameters.name: BA_CmdHSc3
parameters.description: Commanded Momentum Vector (Z) in s/c frame

parameters.name: BA_NMiss
parameters.description: Number of missed CEPs in Eclipse

parameters.name: BA_FailCount
parameters.description: Number of consecutive periods with invalid sensor calcs

parameters.name: BA_CepMet
parameters.description: Mission Elapsed Time of last sun pulse

parameters.name: BR_RCV_LPSTRS
parameters.description: Receiver Loop Stress (Carrier Freq Offset kHz)

parameters.name: BP_FiltSpRate
parameters.description: Filtered Spin Rate given to CIDP

parameters.name: BP_AstQuatValid
parameters.description: AST Quarternion valid flag given to CIDP (0=not valid,1=valid)

parameters.name: BP_FltSpRtValid
parameters.description: Filtered Spinrate valid flag given to CIDP (0=not valid,1=valid)

parameters.name: BP_NxtSunXValid
parameters.description: Sun Crossing valid flag given to CIDP (0=not valid,1=valid)

parameters.name: BP_SpnAxisValid
parameters.description: Spin Axis valid flag given to CIDP (0=not valid,1=valid)

parameters.name: BP_SpnPhasValid
parameters.description: Spin Phase valid flag given to CIDP (0=not valid,1=valid)

parameters.name: BF_InvalidChks
parameters.description: Flags indicating Frame Validation check failures flag.

parameters.name: BD_AdaEx1_10HEvt
parameters.description: Flight s/w ada exception 10 hz counter.

parameters.description: Flight s/w ada exception 1 hz counter.

parameters.name: BD_AdaEx2_10HEvt
parameters.description: Flight s/w ada exception 10 hz counter.

parameters.name: BD_AdaEx2_1HEvt
parameters.description: Flight s/w ada exception 1 hz counter.

parameters.description: Consecutive failures of CIDP Aliveness check

parameters.name: BD_SMSPCErrEvt

parameters.name: BD_SSHtrRsb2Evt
